name: Stronger Together (RoseKittyPowell)
description:
A small survival game where you play as two characters. You can switch between the  characters or play as both characters at once.

The characters have more health and, a stronger attack when you play as both  characters at once.

I made all the assets.

Controles are:

a, d,  and Space to move and, f to attack/destroy.

e, to switch characters and, w to  play as both  characters.

i, to open inventory and intract with the campfire.

q, to go back to the main menu.
